jsx.ui.html
Class Group

java.lang.Object
  js.Disposable
      jsx.Configurable
          jsx.ui.html.Group

public class Group
extends Configurable

A class for choice groups with its static methods providing group management.

Group objects help Choice widgets maintain synchronized states with their underlying HTML input elements.

Author:
J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.jscripter.org

Field Detail

CHOICES

public static Id<ArrayLike<Choice>> CHOICES

A global identifier for a configurable property of a Group object.

The identified configurable property of a Group object is a reference to an array of Choice objects that holds members of the group.

Since:
1.0

synchronize

public void synchronize()

Synchronizes all members of the group.

This method basically invokes Choice.synchronize() method on each choice member of the current group.

Since:
1.0
